answers.answer: I was induced due to kidney stones followed by an infection from surgeries ect. At 37 weeks

With my first I was due to pre-eclampsia. ..this time I am hoping to be induced one week early again but this time due to his weight! At 35 weeks (38 weeks now) he weighted 6 1/2 lbs....most likely my little guy is going to be 10 lbs and I have been in physical therapy since 32 weeks....my body actually is not up to par to go the full 40 weeks with a 10 lb baby!

I was induced 2 weeks ago (at 38+6) due to me having gestational diabetes and high protein in my urine. They were afraid I would get high blood pressure and develop preeclampsia. Good luck and best wishes!
